Flow.description: - Collects information on the contact for which a Grant is created and the worth and date of the Grant - Checks, how many Grants have already been given to the contact - Guide the user via Screens to the correct Approval process for the Grant
Flow.label: Grant Screen Flow

fields.name: Enter_Grant_Information_Text_above_150
fields.fieldText:
The combined amount of grants in the last 12 months is above 150€. Therefore, you need to get an approval from your supervisor for it. 


Please enter the necessary information for the grant!

validationRule.errorMessage: Bitte trage nicht mehr als 255 Zeichen ein!

fields.name: Enter_Grant_Information_Text_above_350
fields.fieldText:
Since the amount of the combined grants within the last 12 months is above 350€, you need to get approval from your supervisor and the responsible Compliance Manager.


Please enter all the necessary information for the grant!

validationRule.errorMessage: Bitte trage nicht mehr als 255 Zeichen ein!

fields.name: Enter_Grant_Information_Text_below_150
fields.fieldText:
The combined amount of grants in the last 12 months is below 150€, therefore the grant will be automatically approved.


Please enter the necessary information for the grant!

validationRule.errorMessage: Bitte trage nicht mehr als 255 Zeichen ein!

screens.name: Collect_Grant_Information_for_PEP_above_25
screens.label: Collect Grant Information for PEP above 25

fields.name: Enter_Grant_Information_Text_PEP_above_25
fields.fieldText:
The receiver of the grant is a politically exposed person.

Since the grant is above 25€ you need to get permission for it from the responsible Compliance Manager.

Additionally the office-bearer needs to be made aware of the necessary consent that needs to be given by their government entity.


Please enter all the necessary information for the grant.

validationRule.errorMessage: Bitte trage nicht mehr als 50 Zeichen ein!
Bitte trage nicht mehr als 255 Zeichen ein!

fields.name: Grant_Success_Above_150_Message
fields.fieldText:
A grant has been generated.


Please get an approval from your supervisor for it. 


Afterwards, please change the approval status corresponding to the received answer and upload the permission to the grant record.

fields.name: Grant_Success_Above_350_Message
fields.fieldText:
A grant has been generated.


Since the combined amount of grant in the last 12 months is above 350€, you need to get permission for it from your supervisor and the responsible Compliance Manager.


Please change the approval status corresponding to the received answer and upload the permission to the grant record.

fields.name: Grant_Success_for_PEP_Message
fields.fieldText:
A grant has been generated.


Since the grant is above 25€, you need to get permission for it from the responsible Compliance Manager.

Additionally the office-bearer needs to be made aware of the necessary consent that needs to be given by their government entity.


Please change the approval status corresponding to the received answer and upload the permission to the grant record.
